GRAND_DELUXE.name: GRAND DELUXE
GRAND_DELUXE.description: Experience luxury at its finest in our Grand Deluxe rooms. These spacious and elegantly appointed rooms offer stunning views and premium amenities to ensure a comfortable and memorable stay. Immerse yourself in opulence as you unwind in the lavish surroundings, where every detail has been meticulously crafted to exceed your expectations.

SUPER_DELUXE.name: SUPER DELUXE
SUPER_DELUXE.description: Indulge in comfort and style with our Super Deluxe rooms. Featuring modern furnishings and thoughtful touches, these rooms provide the perfect retreat after a day of exploring the city. Relax in contemporary elegance and enjoy the tranquility of your surroundings, knowing that every comfort has been considered to enhance your stay.

FAMILY_DELUXE.name: FAMILY DELUXE
FAMILY_DELUXE.description: Ideal for families traveling together, our Family Deluxe rooms offer ample space and thoughtful amenities to ensure a relaxing stay for everyone. Enjoy quality time together in a comfortable and inviting environment, where each member of the family can unwind and create cherished memories that will last a lifetime.

COUPLE_SUITE.name: COUPLE SUITE
COUPLE_SUITE.description: Treat yourself and your loved one to a romantic getaway in our Couple Suite. Featuring luxurious furnishings and intimate settings, these suites provide the perfect ambiance for a memorable stay. Escape the ordinary and indulge in moments of pure bliss as you revel in each other's company in this enchanting retreat.

GARDEN_SUITE.name: GARDEN SUITE
GARDEN_SUITE.description: Escape to tranquility in our Garden Suite, where lush greenery and serene surroundings await. These spacious suites offer a private oasis, perfect for rejuvenating body and mind. Immerse yourself in nature's embrace and let the beauty of the garden inspire moments of serenity and relaxation.

STANDARD_SUITE.name: STANDARD SUITE
STANDARD_SUITE.description: Experience comfort and convenience in our Standard Suite. Thoughtfully designed with modern amenities, these suites offer everything you need for a pleasant stay, whether you're traveling for business or leisure. Enjoy the simplicity of elegant design and the ease of modern living in these welcoming accommodations.

Long weekend discount.title: Long weekend discount
Long weekend discount.description: Applies only if trip more than 2 days and across weekends

Upfront payment discount.title: Upfront payment discount
Upfront payment discount.description: Pay 100% while booking and get a discount of 10%

Weekend discount.title: Weekend discount
Weekend discount.description: Applies only if trip falls around a Saturday and Sunday

Exclusive Retreat.title: Exclusive Retreat
Exclusive Retreat.description: Spend $10 every night you stay and earm $150 in dining credit at the resort.

Spring Offer.title: Spring Offer
Spring Offer.description: Enjoy 25% off on your next booking .

highestPromotion: Applies only if trip more than 2 days and across weekends
